About Me

My name is Lucas Winkler and I am striving to become an efficient web developer. I am currently a student at Conestoga College for the Computer Programmer/Analyst Three Year Diploma Program. I do not have any professional experience in the web development field at the moment.


As far as personal projects I don't not have anything worth talking about. This website is my first real project and it is built in HTML5, CSS3, jQuery and any other small libraries. Eventually it will be re-built in React and Bootstrap. My plan is to create multiple projects over the summer that are worth displaying on this website.

This website was created in HTML5, CSS3, jQuery and other small libraries. It is being hosted on netlify and is not made in any front-end frameworks.
